How I install my games: 
1: scan file first with everything I got!
2: open with magic iso
3: extract to a new folder
4: run setup as admin
5: crack game
6: scan game once more
7: enjoy the free game & buy it if its good

@Gudari

**ATI VIDEO CARD TEXTURE GLITCH SOLVED!!**
==================================

Go into Cataylst Control Centre > go to the "MIPMAP (Detail Level)" parameter > set this to SOMETHING OTHER THAN THE MINIMUM SETTING.

Once you begin the game, you will see objects strewn on the floor (like kid's toys) on the inro screen and this means it's worked (no need to enter the game proper for testing).

Checked this repeatedly and it works for me 100% using HD Radeon 4670 (1GB) and the problem reoccurs when switch back. So "MIPMAP" must be higher than minimum for this game.

No need to thank me, I know I'm universally loved ^_^

Getting a frustrating and bizarre problem here; I hope someone can help me out. The game installs perfectly fine, the main menu loads normally, the intro movie plays fine, but once I've entered the game, all the sound is gone.  Moreover, I get errors like "int.LocalizationMaps_Alive_SingleM01_Bridge.Script.ERROR : DIALOG LINE NOT FOUND FROM OASIS - Event couldn't be played for dialog line #12481 (VO_MAP_IAA_M01_003_01SAM_DRY). It appears to have happened to all the dialog, though I'm not sure whether the music is gone as well, or if the game is simply very quiet or lacking in much music at the start.

I'll keep researching, but please help.

Damn, this game is so bad! It's extremely linear - they say "jump", you jump, they say "shoot a bullet here", you shoot a bullet here. There is no other way to play! It's definitely not a "free roamer". You can take only one path, everything (!) is already thought for you.
Another thing, this game is ridiculously buggy. For example, there is a scene with first fight. Sometimes the enemy is scared, sometimes not. You have to push him off the ledge - but sometimes you can't, you have to move from left to right to find a "perfect" position.
Another thing, it's a really bad console port. It looks bad, works bad, feels bad.

Don't waste your time on this game. At least not before at least 3 patches.
Yeah this game looks promising for its content size. I saw some of the video ads for it and Glad it's available on here already too.

Thanks for the upload, working so far (just tested a few minutes).
Got the "out of space" pb during install, this is because the setup auto-extracts itself inside the default Temp directory, which is located on C: so if you have little space on C: you need to modify the environment variables : [url]http://answers.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/forum/windows_7-files/change-location-of-temp-files-folder-to-another/19f13330-dde1-404c-aa27-a76c0b450818[/url] to put Temp on another drive. 
Hope it helps, thanks again !

Correct link :
http://answers.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/forum/windows_7-files/change-location-of-temp-files-folder-to-another/19f13330-dde1-404c-aa27-a76c0b450818
